definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :2Sa 14:14 only pl. [[מַ֫יִם]] waters, water (NH id.; MI:23 [[[ין]]][[מ]]; SI:5 [[המים]]; Aram. [[מַיׇּא]], [[מַיִּין]], mayo0 As. mû, pl. mê, also mâmu Dl:HWB 394; Ar. ma0a0’un Eth. moy:, pl. moy4t:; Sab. [[[מו]]], [[מום]] pl. [[מון]], Min. [[[מה]]], pl. [[מהן]] DHM:6th Or. Congr. (Leiden) ii. 1, 451 f. (v. on these forms Ba:ZMG xiii.1888, 341 ff.));—[[מַ֫יִם]] ([[מָָיִם]]) Ge 1:2 +; [[הַמַּ֫יְמָה]] Ex 7:15, Ex 8:16; cstr. [[מֵי]] Ge 7:7 + 71 t.; [[מֵימֵי]] Ex 4:9 + 10 t. + Qr 2Ki 18:27 = Is 36:12; sf. [[מֵימַי]] Ho 2:7 + 1Sa 25:11 (but rd. here [[יֵינִי]] LXX Ew Th We Klo Dr Kit Bu); [[מֵימֶ֫יְ]] Ex 23:25 + 3 t.; [[מֵימָיו]] Nu 20:8 + 6 t.; [[מֵימֶיהָ]] Je 6:7, Je 50:38; [[מֵימֵינוּ]] La 5:4; [[מֵימֵיהֶם]] Ex 7:19 + 4 t.;—waters, water (c. adj. pl. Ge 26:19, Ex 15:10, Le 14:5, Le 14:6, Le 14:50 + oft., so alw. c. adj.; also c. pt. pl. Nu 5:18, Nu 5:19, Nu 5:24, 2Ki 3:20 +; c.pron. pl. Nu 20:13, Nu 27:14, 2Ki 2:21 +; cf. sf. Jos 4:18; before pl. vb. Ge 1:9, Ge 1:20, Ge 1:21, Ge 7:17 + oft.; after pl. vb. Jos 3:13, Is 28:17, Pr 9:17, Ez Eze 31:4 +; rarely c. sg. vb.; before, Ge 9:15, Le 11:34, Nu 20:2, Nu 24:7, Nu 33:14, 2Ki 3:9; after, Nu 19:13; Nu 19:20);—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: water of a spring or well ([[עַיִן]],[[בְּאֵר ]]) Ge 16:7, Ge 24:11, Ge 24:13, Ge 24:13, Ge 24:43, Ex 15:27, Ex 15:27 (J), Ge 21:19, Ge 21:25, Nu 20:17, Nu 21:16 (E), etc.; for drinking, also Am 4:8, Am 8:11, Jon 3:7 + oft.; out of rock Ex 17:6 (E), Nu 20:8, Nu 20:8, Nu 20:10, Nu 20:11 (P), De 8:15 etc.; [[מֵי מְרִיבָה]] (RS:Sem. i. 165; 2nd ed. 181) Nu 20:13, Nu 20:24, Nu 27:14 (P), De 33:8, Ps 81:8, Ps 106:32; cf. De 32:51, Ez Eze 47:19, Eze 48:28; for washing (hands, feet, person) Ge 18:4, Ge 24:32 m Ge 43:24 (J), 2Ki 3:11, Ex 29:4, Ex 30:20, Le 15:5, Le 15:6 + (P); (victims) Le 1:9, Le 1:13, Le 8:21 (P); (vessels) Le 6:21, Lv 12:32, 12:34 (P); (garments) Le 15:17, Nu 19:8 (P); for cooking Ex 12:9 (P), cf. Is 64:l, Ez Eze 24:3 (symbol.); for purification Nu 8:7 ([[מֵי חַטָּאת]]) Nu 19:9 ([[מֵי נִדָּה]]), cf. v:Nu 19:13, v:Nu 19:18, v:Nu 19:20, v:Nu 19:21, v:31, Nu 31:23, Nu 31:23 (all P), Ez Eze 36:25 (fig.).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of a river, Nile Ex 2:10, Ex 4:9, Ex 4:9 (J), Je 2:18 etc.; Jordan Jos 3:8 (D), v:Jos 3:15, v:Jos 3:16 (JE), etc.; Euphrates Is 8:7 (fig.), Je 2:18; Ezek.'s river Ez Eze 47:1, Eze 47:1, Eze 47:2 +, etc.; of streams, canals, etc., esp., as condition of fertility De 8:7, De 10:7, Is 1:30, Pr 30:16, 2Ki 3:17 +, etc.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of sea Am 5:8, Am 9:6; Red Sea Ex 15:8, Ex 15:10, Ex 15:19 (song), Ex 14:21, Ex 14:22, Ex 14:26 + (P), Jos 2:10 (D), etc.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: subterranean Ex 20:4 (E), De 4:18, De 5:8, cf. Job 26:5, Ps 136:6.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: in clouds Je 10:13, Job 26:8, Ps 29:3, Ps 29:3, Ps 104:3, Ps 148:4, etc.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: of dew Ju Jdg 6:38.

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: primæval deep Ge 1:2, Ge 1:6 (P).
c. nomm. pr. loc. (q. v.), to denote springs, streams, or seas belonging to, near, such places: [[מֵימֵי מִחְרַיִם]] Ex 7:19, Ex 8:2; [[מֵי מְרִיבָה]] (v. supr.

definitions.title: 1 a
definitions.body: ); [[מֵי מֵרוֹם]] Jos 11:5, Jos 11:7; [[מֵי עֵין־שֶׁמֶשׁ]] Jos 15:7; [[מֵי נֶפְתּוֹחַ]] Jos 15:9, Jos 18:15; [[מֵי יְרִיחוֹ]] Jos 16:1; [[מֵי מְגִּדּוֹ]] Ju Jdg 5:19; [[ם]]([[י]])[[מֵי נִמְרִ]] Is 15:6, Je 48:34; [[מֵי דִימוֹן]] Is 15:9; cf. [[מֵי הַשִּׁלּׂחַ]] Is 8:6; [[מֵימֵי גִּיחוֹן הָעֶלְיוֹן]] 2Ch 32:30; cf. also n. pr. loc. [[מִשְׂרְפוֹת מַיִם]] Jos 11:8, Jos 13:6.

special uses are: [[מֵי רַגְלַיִם]] water of the feet = urine 2Ki 18:27 = Is 36:12; cf. [[מַדְמֵנׇה בְּמֵי]] Is 25:10 Kt in water of a dunghill (> Qr [[בְּמוֹ]]); [[מַיִם לַחַץ]] water (which is) distress, because drunk in imprisonment 1Ki 22:27 (‖[[לֶחֶם לַחַץ]]) = 2Ch 18:26; [[בְּמֵי־שָָׁלֶג]] in snow-water Job 9:30 Qr (Kt [[במו]]; Me Hoffm Siegfr [[כְּמוֹ]]), [[מֵימֵי שֶׁלֶג]] Job 24:19; [[מַיִם קְדשִׁים]] † Nu 5:17 holy water (cf. RS:Sem.165, 2nd ed.181, but text dubious, v. Di); [[מֵי הַמָּרִים]] bitter water †Nu 5:18, Nu 5:19, Nu 5:23, Nu 5:24; cf. Ex 15:23 ([[כִּי מָרִים הֵם]]), opp. [[וַיִּמְתְּקוּ הַמַּיִם]] v:Ex 15:25 and the waters were sweetened; [[מֵי חַטָּאת]], [[מֵי נִדָּה]] v. supr.

definitions.title: 1 a;
definitions.body: [[מַיִם חַיִּים]] living (i.e. running) water Le 14:5, Le 14:6, Le 14:50, Le 14:51, Le 14:52, Nu 19:17, also (fig.) Zec 14:8 (cf. Ez Eze 47), and (fig.) Je 2:13, Je 17:13. See also infr. (cf. Nu 21:17, Nu 21:18; v. RS:Sem.i.127.157; 2nd ed.135,176).
among fig. uses are:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of distress Is 43:2, Ps 66:12 (‖[[אֵשׁ]]), Ps 69:2, La 3:54; usu. many waters 2Sa 22:17 = Ps 18:17, cf. Job 22:11, Ps 32:6, Ps 144:7, or deep waters Ps 69:3, Ps 69:15, cf. v:Ps 69:16; also [[מֵי־ראׁשׁ]] water of gall Je 8:14, Je 9:14, Je 23:15.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[פֶּרֶץ מַיִם]] 2Sa 5:20 = 1Ch 14:11 of outbursting force.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[מַיִם שְׁאוֹן]] Is 17:12, Is 17:13 of rushing nations.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: of what is impetuous, violent, overwhelming Is 28:2, Is 28:17, Ho 10:7, Job 27:20, Ps 124:4, Ps 124:5, Ps 88:18; sim.of impetuousness [[פַּחַז כַּמַּיִ ם]] Ge 49:4.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: (as running away) of heart in timidity Jos 7:5, cf. Ps 22:16, of knees Ez Eze 7:17, Eze 21:12.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: of transitoriness Job 11:16, Job 24:18, Ps 58:8.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: of refreshment Is 32:2, Is 49:10; spiritual Is 12:3.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: [[מֵי מְנֻחוֹת]] Ps 23:2 in fig. of rest and peace, cf. Je 31:9.

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: of reckless bloodshed (poured out like water) Ps 79:3; cf. pouring away (and not eating) blood De 12:16, De 12:24, De 15:23.

definitions.title: j.
definitions.body: [[בְּאֵר מַיִם חַיִּים]] Ct So 4:15 fig. of bride; [[מַיִם מִבּוֹרְֶָ]] Pr 5:15 of enjoyment of one's own wife; of harlotry [[מַיִם גְּנוּבִים]] Pr 9:17 stolen waters.

definitions.title: k.
definitions.body: of outpoured wrath of ´[[י]] Ho 5:10.
of abundant justice Am 5:24

definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: of outpoured feelings Job 3:24; [[שִׁפְכִי כַמַּיִם לִבֵח]] La 2:19.—Is 48:1 rd. prob. [[מִמְּעֵי]] for MT [[מִמֵּי]], so Secker Du Che:Hpt Skinner, cf. Di.
